    • Method Detail

      • getAddress

        public abstract NetworkAddress getAddress()
        Returns the information necessary for connecting clients to this server.

        This method returns a NetworkAddress object which contains both the IP address and the port number corresponding to this ServerImplementation.

        Returns:
        This ServerImplementation's corresponding NetworkAddress
        See Also:
        NetworkAddress

      • getClients

        public abstract Set<ServerSideClient> getClients()
        Returns a set of ServerSideClients corresponding to all clients which have successfully connected and been verified by the server.

        The returned set is not guaranteed to dynamically update to reflect changes in server connections. While some implementations may provide this feature, the only way to ensure an up-to-date set is to call this method again. Additionally, changes to the returned set may not necessarily be reflected in the server.

        Returns:
        A set of ServerSideClients corresponding to this server's clients
        See Also:
        ServerSideClient
